text:
Hello,

I’m the Marketing Head at <http://Codegiant.io|Codegiant.io> – an up-and-coming end-to-end software development platform with numerous exciting features.

We’re currently looking forward to building our in-house marketing team right from scratch – these will include both freelancers and full-time professionals.

This means – if you exceed our expectations and deliver the results we desire, it could very well become a full-time opportunity.

As of this writing, we are looking for technical writers – people with deep expertise and years of experience in Agile Methodology, CI/CD, Kubernetes, Git, Monitoring, DevOps and other areas that would make the development lifecycle simpler and efficient for software development teams.

Some of our direct competitors include GitLab, GitHub, Atlassian.

Bonus points if you can help us build a fool-proof and results-driven content marketing strategy for our business.

First, we’d like to know if you are a right fit for our business – so the first thing we’ll do is assign about four-five writers a test article (paid one) and based on the output, we’ll be taking things forward.

Remember – this is a long-term opportunity, so please apply only if you have the time.

Kindly mail your resume/portfolio at <mailto:ankit@codegiant.io|ankit@codegiant.io>

Thank you!

And have a great week!

text: Hello everyone, I am freelance writer with 3 years of experience in writing. I am starting out as SaaS writer and willing to write some guest posts around the same niche. If you are a SaaS brand who is looking out for something like this. Do let me know. Thank you

text: Would love to get some feedback on my (rebranded) mental health podcast for freelancers and business owners! Ep1 is all about recognizing and managing stress: <https://bettermental.fm/episodes/bettermental-ep-001-stress-management-for-business-owners>
